The lab is very happy to announce that Stephanie was [selected](https://caes.ucdavis.edu/news/aaas) as a Fellow of the [American Association for the Advancement of Science](https://www.aaas.org/news/aaas-welcomes-471-scientists-and-engineers-honorary-fellows)! The induction ceremony takes place 7 June in Washington DC. The citation reads: "For distinguished contributions that have advanced environmental and aquatic science through interdisciplinary collaboration by enabling the infrastructure, open science, education, and training needed for large-scale inclusive environmental research."
